text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

(Two sandwiches... No... My schedule is
packed until tonight, so maybe one more pack...)

Mm, Producer-san, thanks~
for buyin' these ham sandwiches~!

No, I was debating between the
egg sandwich, so it's really okay.

...Haha, your hesitant expression!
What's wrong?
... Well, I can't compete with Kogane.

Then let's split it and eat half each~!
Holding back ain't good for ya~!
Thank you.

But it's kinda rare to see Kogane
buying convenience store food, isn't it?

Do ya really think so~? Actually, I was plannin'
to make a bento, but when I opened the fridge~

There was nothin' in it~!
I've been so busy lately, it's a shame...

Is that so? ...Sorry about that.
Your schedule has been packed lately, and---

---Producer-san! It's not like that!
Today is just a coincidence!
Bein' busy is a good thing!

So, I'm grateful to Producer-san
for givin' me lots of work!
Kogane...
Right now, I'm havin' so much fun!
It's great that you're keepin' me even busier!
